#  Dungeon Siege III 

`BLES01161.savepatch`

### 1.  Same patches may not be supported by BSD yet
### 2. Lucas Montbarron
### 3. Max Money (Not Working)

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
62000000 0000001C
62010100 000480BC
62120001 00000038
62200100 00000004
62010100 00000000
62120001 00000170
62200100 0000000C
62400000 05F5E0FF
```
